metadata.title: CVE-2024-34580 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Apache XML Security for C++ through 2.0.4 implements the XML SignatureSyntax and Processing (XMLDsig) specification without protection against anSSRF payload in a KeyInfo element. NOTE: the supplier disputes this CVERecord on the grounds that they are implementing the specification"correctly" and are not "at fault."

criterions.comment: xml-security-c package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
